sections.summary: recent graduate seeking opportunity in hardware and software support. highly poised and dedicated with strong education and training in supporting computer issues. systematic it professional proficient in network, project and emergency management. able to install hardware, patch software and configure internal systems. complex problem-solver with top-notch planning and communication strengths. resourceful team player and fast learner seeking to leverage background into a database administrator role with a progressive organization.
